mapper.insert: INSERT INTO club(club_name, category, wide_area, detail_area, introduction) VALUES (#{clubName}, #{category}, #{wideArea}, #{detailArea}, #{introduction})
mapper.select: SELECT club_id FROM club ORDER BY club_id DESC LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member (user_id, club_id, leader) VALUES (#{userId}, #{clubId}, #{leader})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) > 0 FROM member WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND club_id = #{clubId} AND leader = 'Y'
mapper.update: UPDATE club SET club_name = #{clubName}, category = #{category}, wide_area = #{wideArea}, detail_area = #{detailArea}, introduction = #{introduction} WHERE club_id = #{clubId}
